name: Nvidia Corp.
rationale: Dominant AI GPU supplier with 80–95% market share, driving the AI boom with explosive data center growth and robust backlog.
company_description: Nvidia Corporation is a leading technology company specializing in graphics processing units (GPUs) and AI computing solutions.

name: Microsoft Corp.
rationale: Cloud and AI leader integrating GPT into Azure and Office; generating over $13B in annual AI revenue and investing heavily in AI infrastructure.
company_description: Microsoft Corporation is a global technology leader known for its software, cloud computing, and enterprise services.

name: Lockheed Martin Corp.
rationale: Top U.S. defense contractor with major programs like the F-35; set to benefit from higher defense budgets and record order backlogs.
company_description: Lockheed Martin is an American aerospace and defense company that designs and manufactures advanced military systems.

name: Eli Lilly & Co.
rationale: Pharma innovator with a breakthrough obesity drug (Zepbound/Mounjaro) and a strong pipeline, supporting significant sales growth.
company_description: Eli Lilly and Company is a global pharmaceutical firm focused on innovative therapies for chronic and acute conditions.

name: Caterpillar Inc.
rationale: World’s leading construction machinery maker benefiting from over $1 trillion in U.S. infrastructure spending and reshoring trends.
company_description: Caterpillar Inc. manufactures heavy equipment and engines, serving construction, mining, and infrastructure sectors worldwide.

name: Eaton Corp.
rationale: Electrical equipment leader with strong exposure to U.S. factory build-outs; recognized as a top reshoring pick with robust order growth.
company_description: Eaton Corporation provides energy-efficient solutions for electrical systems and power management across industries.

name: Northrop Grumman Corp.
rationale: Key contractor in strategic programs including the B-21 stealth bomber and nuclear systems, with strong backlog visibility.
company_description: Northrop Grumman is an American aerospace and defense technology company specializing in advanced systems and solutions.

name: Novo Nordisk A/S
rationale: Maker of Wegovy and Ozempic with overwhelming demand in obesity and diabetes care, poised for market expansion.
company_description: Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company that leads in diabetes care and obesity treatment through innovative products.

name: Amazon.com Inc.
rationale: Cloud titan (AWS) offering AI-as-a-Service and robotics in fulfillment centers, driving efficiency and long-term cloud growth.
company_description: Amazon.com, Inc. is a multinational technology company focused on e-commerce, cloud computing, and digital innovation.

name: Tesla Inc.
rationale: EV and autonomy leader applying AI to self-driving and robotics (Optimus robot) with scaling manufacturing capabilities.
company_description: Tesla, Inc. designs and manufactures electric vehicles and renewable energy products while pioneering autonomous driving technology.

name: Broadcom Inc.
rationale: Provides critical semiconductors and networking chips for AI applications; benefits from massive cloud capex and strategic acquisitions.
company_description: Broadcom Inc. is a global technology company that develops semiconductors and infrastructure software solutions.

name: Palantir Technologies
rationale: Offers a leading data analytics and AI platform for government and enterprises; profitable and positioned for expanding contracts.
company_description: Palantir Technologies is a software company specializing in big data analytics and providing solutions for complex data challenges.

name: Rockwell Automation Inc.
rationale: Industrial automation leader with rising orders as companies invest in modernizing production lines and benefiting from reshoring trends.
company_description: Rockwell Automation provides industrial automation and information solutions to improve manufacturing productivity.

name: United Rentals Inc.
rationale: Largest construction equipment rental firm poised to benefit from increased infrastructure and factory construction activity.
company_description: United Rentals is the world's largest equipment rental company, serving industrial and construction sectors with a broad range of machinery.

name: Nucor Corp.
rationale: America’s largest steel producer benefiting from reshoring trends and strong domestic construction demand.
company_description: Nucor Corporation is a leading American steel producer manufacturing a wide array of steel products for various industries.

name: First Solar Inc.
rationale: Top U.S. solar panel maker capitalizing on IRA incentives and expanding domestic production capacity.
company_description: First Solar is an American manufacturer of photovoltaic solar panels and provider of utility-scale solar power solutions.

name: Exxon Mobil Corp.
rationale: Integrated oil major benefiting from favorable energy policies and sustained high oil prices in a shifting policy environment.
company_description: Exxon Mobil is one of the world's largest publicly traded international oil and gas companies, engaged in exploration, production, and refining.

name: SLB (Schlumberger Ltd.)
rationale: World’s leading oilfield services provider positioned to benefit from rising drilling activity and increased capital expenditure in oil & gas.
company_description: Schlumberger Limited is the largest oilfield services company globally, offering technology and services to the energy industry.

name: Devon Energy Corp.
rationale: Shale oil & gas producer highly leveraged to U.S. oil prices with operational efficiency and shareholder-friendly practices.
company_description: Devon Energy is an independent energy company focused on the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas.

name: Equinix Inc.
rationale: Largest global data center REIT benefiting from strong demand driven by AI and cloud growth, with high occupancy and pricing power.
company_description: Equinix is a global data center and colocation provider offering interconnection and hosting services for digital businesses.

name: RTX Corp. (Raytheon Tech.)
rationale: Diversified defense and aerospace firm with strong demand for its precision weapons and missile systems amid rising military spending.
company_description: RTX Corporation (formerly Raytheon Technologies) is a major American defense contractor providing aerospace and defense products and services.

name: CrowdStrike Holdings
rationale: Leader in endpoint cybersecurity with approximately 40% annual recurring revenue growth, benefiting from rising global cyber spend.
company_description: CrowdStrike Holdings is a cybersecurity technology company specializing in cloud-based endpoint protection, threat intelligence, and cyberattack response.

name: Intuitive Surgical Inc.
rationale: Dominant surgical robotics company with over 80% market share and a recurring revenue model driven by expanding global adoption.
company_description: Intuitive Surgical is a medical device company renowned for its da Vinci robotic surgical systems and innovations in minimally invasive surgery.

name: Vertex Pharmaceuticals
rationale: Biotech leader in cystic fibrosis treatment with a robust innovation pipeline, including potential CRISPR-based therapies.
company_description: Vertex Pharmaceuticals is a biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing therapies for cystic fibrosis and other serious diseases.

name: Advanced Micro Devices
rationale: Key challenger in the AI chip market; launching MI300 accelerators and expecting significant sales growth in AI-related products.
company_description: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is a multinational semiconductor company that designs and manufactures microprocessors, GPUs, and related technologies.

name: Intel Corp.
rationale: Turnaround play benefiting from U.S. subsidies for new fabs and next-generation GPU/AI chips, offering value with high dividend yield.
company_description: Intel Corporation is one of the world's largest semiconductor manufacturers, known for its microprocessors and chipsets.

name: Snowflake Inc.
rationale: Cloud data platform with ~40% YoY growth, enabling enterprises to store and analyze data for AI and analytics applications.
company_description: Snowflake Inc. is a cloud-based data warehousing company that provides scalable data storage, processing, and analytic solutions.

name: Datadog Inc.
rationale: Cloud monitoring and security platform that supports AI/ML application performance tracking and enhances infrastructure observability.
company_description: Datadog Inc. is a monitoring and analytics platform for cloud applications, offering real-time observability of infrastructure and performance data.

name: Alphabet (Google)
rationale: Pioneer in AI innovations with DeepMind and broad integration of AI across products, also leading in autonomous driving and quantum computing.
company_description: Alphabet Inc. is the parent company of Google, providing search, advertising, cloud, and cutting-edge technology solutions globally.

name: ON Semiconductor
rationale: Specialist in power and automotive chips, expanding domestic production and benefiting from U.S. CHIPS Act incentives.
company_description: ON Semiconductor is a supplier of semiconductor solutions focusing on energy-efficient technologies for automotive, industrial, and consumer markets.

name: Nova Ltd.
rationale: Metrology equipment supplier for chip fabs, expected to see strong orders from new U.S. facilities and deliver high-margin products.
company_description: Nova Ltd. provides advanced metrology and inspection equipment critical to semiconductor manufacturing processes.

name: Camtek Ltd.
rationale: Semiconductor inspection equipment maker positioned to benefit from CHIPS Act subsidies and growing demand for advanced packaging solutions.
company_description: Camtek Ltd. specializes in automated inspection and metrology solutions for semiconductor manufacturing and advanced packaging.

name: Jabil Inc.
rationale: Leading contract manufacturer expanding its U.S. footprint, well positioned to benefit from reshoring trends in electronics production.
company_description: Jabil Inc. is an electronics manufacturing services company providing design, production, and supply chain solutions to global brands.

name: Flex Ltd.
rationale: Major EMS provider with facilities in the U.S. and Mexico; benefits from a diverse customer base as companies shift manufacturing closer to home.
company_description: Flex Ltd. is a multinational electronics manufacturing services provider offering comprehensive end-to-end supply chain solutions.

name: EastGroup Properties
rationale: Industrial REIT focused on warehouse properties in key manufacturing hubs, benefiting from increased demand driven by reshoring.
company_description: EastGroup Properties is a real estate investment trust that owns and operates industrial properties, particularly in high-demand manufacturing regions.

name: ABB Ltd.
rationale: Global automation and electrification company with strong U.S. exposure, set to benefit from both private capex and public infrastructure spending.
company_description: ABB Ltd. is a multinational corporation specializing in robotics, power, heavy electrical equipment, and automation technology.

name: Commercial Metals Co.
rationale: Steel rebar producer benefiting from construction and infrastructure projects tied to reshoring and domestic manufacturing growth.
company_description: Commercial Metals Company produces steel and metal products, specializing in rebar and other construction materials for industrial applications.

name: Enbridge Inc.
rationale: North America’s largest pipeline operator, benefiting from resilient energy demand, supportive policies, and strong dividend yield.
company_description: Enbridge Inc. is an energy infrastructure company focusing on the transportation of oil and gas through an extensive pipeline network.

name: NextEra Energy Inc.
rationale: Leading renewable energy utility with strong growth prospects driven by IRA incentives and expanding utility rate bases.
company_description: NextEra Energy is a clean energy company and the world's largest generator of renewable energy from wind and solar power.

name: Jacobs Solutions Inc.
rationale: Prominent engineering and construction management firm with record backlogs, benefiting from a surge in public infrastructure projects.
company_description: Jacobs Solutions Inc. provides technical, professional, and construction services to support large-scale infrastructure and government projects.

name: Quanta Services Inc.
rationale: Specialist in electrical grid and pipeline construction, poised to benefit from utilities upgrading and connecting renewable projects.
company_description: Quanta Services is a leading infrastructure services company providing specialized construction and engineering services for the energy sector.

name: L3Harris Technologies
rationale: Defense electronics and communications leader, well positioned to secure new DoD contracts as military modernization efforts continue.
company_description: L3Harris Technologies is an American defense contractor and technology company offering advanced communications, surveillance, and electronic systems.

name: Palo Alto Networks
rationale: Global cybersecurity leader transitioning to an AI-powered platform model with strong growth in firewalls and cloud security solutions.
company_description: Palo Alto Networks is a cybersecurity company that delivers advanced network security and cloud-based threat detection services.

name: BAE Systems plc
rationale: Europe’s largest defense contractor benefiting from rising NATO defense spending and allied modernization programs.
company_description: BAE Systems is a British multinational defense, security, and aerospace company providing advanced military technology and services.

name: General Dynamics Corp.
rationale: Diversified defense company with strong backlogs in Marine, Combat, and Aerospace segments, offering stable cash generation.
company_description: General Dynamics is an American aerospace and defense corporation that provides a broad range of military products and services.

name: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals
rationale: Biotech company with a strong track record and a rich pipeline in immunology and oncology, poised for new drug approvals.
company_description: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals is a biotechnology firm focused on developing innovative therapies for a range of serious diseases.

name: Moderna Inc.
rationale: mRNA technology pioneer with an extensive pipeline including RSV, flu, and cancer vaccines, backed by substantial cash reserves.
company_description: Moderna Inc. is a biotechnology company known for its groundbreaking mRNA vaccine technology and its expanding portfolio of therapeutic candidates.

name: CRISPR Therapeutics
rationale: Genome editing biotech on the verge of FDA approval for a CRISPR-based therapy, offering high risk/reward potential.
company_description: CRISPR Therapeutics is a gene-editing company focused on developing transformative therapies using CRISPR/Cas9 technology.

name: AbbVie Inc.
rationale: Large pharmaceutical company with a strong immunology portfolio and high dividend yield, recovering from its Humira patent cliff.
company_description: AbbVie Inc. is a global biopharmaceutical company known for its innovative therapies in immunology, oncology, and other therapeutic areas.

name: MP Materials Corp.
rationale: Restoring the U.S. rare earth supply chain with a mine-to-magnet capability and backed by key DoD contracts, poised for growth.
company_description: MP Materials is focused on mining and processing rare earth elements critical for defense and advanced technology applications.

name: Albemarle Corp.
rationale: One of the largest lithium producers globally, benefiting from increased EV sales and battery production localization with expanding capacity.
company_description: Albemarle Corporation is a specialty chemicals company and a leading producer of lithium and other critical materials for energy storage.

name: ASML Holding N.V.
rationale: Sole producer of EUV lithography equipment essential for advanced chipmaking; enjoys a near-monopoly with strong pricing power.
company_description: ASML Holding is a Dutch company that manufactures cutting-edge photolithography systems used in semiconductor production.

name: Applied Materials Inc.
rationale: Leading semiconductor fabrication equipment vendor benefiting from a global fab construction boom and expansion into advanced packaging.
company_description: Applied Materials Inc. supplies equipment, services, and software essential for semiconductor and display manufacturing.

name: Arista Networks Inc.
rationale: Dominant provider of high-speed data center networking switches, benefiting from AI-driven cloud infrastructure investments.
company_description: Arista Networks is a technology company specializing in high-speed network switches and software for data centers and enterprise environments.

name: Texas Instruments Inc.
rationale: Analog and embedded chip leader building new fabs in Texas; vital for industrial, automotive, and defense applications with strong cash flow.
company_description: Texas Instruments designs and manufactures semiconductors, with a focus on analog and embedded processing solutions.

name: CPKC (Can. Pac. Kansas City)
rationale: The first USMCA railroad, uniquely positioned to capitalize on near-shoring trade and volume growth following a major merger.
company_description: CPKC is a North American railroad company formed by the merger of Canadian Pacific and Kansas City Southern, operating across Canada, the U.S., and Mexico.

name: Zebra Technologies
rationale: Maker of barcode, RFID, and automation solutions for warehouses, benefiting from reshoring and increased demand for supply chain visibility.
company_description: Zebra Technologies provides solutions for data capture and automatic identification, enhancing supply chain and warehouse management.

name: FedEx Corp.
rationale: Global shipping and logistics provider poised for margin expansion and benefiting from resilient consumer demand and regional distribution growth.
company_description: FedEx Corp. is a multinational courier delivery services company offering transportation, logistics, and supply chain management solutions.

name: Meta Platforms Inc.
rationale: Social media giant pivoting to AI and VR, investing heavily in AI infrastructure with robust growth in AI-driven ad tools and new feature adoption.
company_description: Meta Platforms Inc. is a technology conglomerate known for its social media platforms and significant investments in virtual reality and artificial intelligence.

name: Deere & Co.
rationale: Leading farm and construction equipment maker benefiting from strong agricultural markets and infrastructure projects, with a focus on automation.
company_description: Deere & Company manufactures agricultural, construction, and forestry machinery, and provides related financial services.
